definitions.text: offensive term for an openly homosexual man
hinder or prevent (the efforts, plans, or desires) of
examples: What ultimately frustrated every challenger was Ruth's amazing September surge

definitions.text: put in a dangerous, disadvantageous, or difficult position
beyond or deviating from the usual or expected
examples: her speech has a funny twang
they have some funny ideas about war
the peculiar aromatic odor of cloves
something definitely queer about this town
